data.actual_result: It's the same color as the dark theme
data.expected_result: The PNG image background color should be #99AAB5 to match
data.short_description: The PNG image background color in white theme is the same as the dark theme while receiving an in-app notification
data.steps_to_repro: - Put sunglasses on your beautiful face - Select the white theme - Get someone to send a PNG picture - Observe
